scripts.optimize-glb: gltf-transform dedup public/scene.glb /tmp/scene-dedup.glb && gltf-transform simplify /tmp/scene-dedup.glb /tmp/scene-simplified.glb --ratio 0.5 --error 0.01 && gltf-transform resize /tmp/scene-simplified.glb /tmp/scene-resized.glb --width 2048 --height 2048 && gltf-transform webp /tmp/scene-resized.glb /tmp/scene-webp.glb --quality 80 && gltf-transform draco /tmp/scene-webp.glb public/scene.glb && rm -f /tmp/scene-dedup.glb /tmp/scene-simplified.glb /tmp/scene-resized.glb /tmp/scene-webp.glb
